# <a name="turn-off-focused-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e8aa-102">Inaktivera fokuserar Inkorgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e8aa-102">Turn off Focused Inbox</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="7e8aa-103">Markera överst på sidan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e8aa-103">At the top of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="7e8aa-104">Öppna fönstret inställningar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e8aa-104">to open the Settings pane.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="7e8aa-105">Flytta **Fokus Inkorgen** växla till av i fönstret inställningar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e8aa-105">In the Settings pane, move the **Focused Inbox** toggle to off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e8aa-106">Mer information finns i [Inaktivera fokuserar Inkorgen](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy#bkmk_outlookcom).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e8aa-106">For more information, see [Turn off Focused Inbox](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy#bkmk_outlookcom).</span></span>
